summary: Detective Superintendent Jane Tennison's (Dame Helen Mirren's) investigation of the murder of a Bosnian refugee leads her to one, or possibly two, Serbian war criminals determined to silence the last witness to a massacre a decade before.
cast: Helen Mirren|Liam Cunningham|Oleg Menshikov|Ben Miles|Robert Pugh|Mark Strong|Velibor Topic|Barnaby Kay|Tanya Moodie|Rad Lazar|Ingeborga Dapkunaite|Olegar Fedoro|Sam Hazeldine|Anna Maria Ashe|Leena Dhingra|Kate Lynn Evans|Rupert Frazer|Steve Gibbs|Stuart Goodwin|Sally Hurst|Anna Mountford|Femi Oguns|Bharti Patel|Tony Pritchard|Finlay Robertson|Hugh Sachs|Dennis Titus|Ann Warungu|Sarah Winman|Clare Holman|Frank Finlay|Phoebe Nicholls|Serge Soric|Eileen Battye|Nadia Cameron-Blakey|Aleksandar Mikic|Boris Boscovic|Zoe Coyle|Alex Giannini|Davyd Harries|Vid Ivanisevic|Dado Jehan|Yehan Jehan|Julia Joyce|Lucy Joyce|Israel Oyelumade|Etela Pardo|Valentine Pelka|Faruk Pruti|Peter Rnic|Adna Sablyich|Stephen Cranford|Ray Donn|Garry Marriott

title: Principal sospechoso: El último testigo
